nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十九集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十九集团军
en: 79th Group Army of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军集团军，隶属北部战区陆军，军部驻地辽宁省辽阳市。在2017年深化国防和军队改革中，以原陆军第三十九集团军为基础调整组建而成。
description.en: A group army of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force, subordinate to the Northern Theater Command Ground Force, with its headquarters in Liaoyang City, Liaoning Province. It was formed in 2017 based on the former 39th Group Army during the military reform.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第三十九集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第三十九集团军
en: 39th Group Army of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force

description.zh-cn: 由中国人民解放军第三十九军于1985年改编而成，是中国人民解放军陆军的重装快速反应集团军之一，长期驻守辽东半岛。2017年改革中被调整组建为第七十九集团军。
description.en: Reorganized from the 39th Corps of the PLA in 1985, it was one of the heavy-armored rapid reaction group armies of the PLA Ground Force, long stationed on the Liaodong Peninsula. It was reorganized into the 79th Group Army in the 2017 reform.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第三十九军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第三十九军
en: 39th Corps of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 于1949年由东北民主联军第二纵队整编而成，参加了第二次国共内战末期战役及朝鲜战争，战功卓著。1985年改编为第三十九集团军。
description.en: Formed in 1949 from the 2nd Column of the Northeast Democratic United Army, it participated in the final campaigns of the Chinese Civil War and the Korean War with distinguished service. It was reorganized into the 39th Group Army in 1985.

nodes.id: 东北民主联军第二纵队

zh-cn: 东北民主联军第二纵队
en: 2nd Column of the Northeast Democratic United Army

description.zh-cn: 1946年由原新四军第三师的第八旅、第十旅、独立旅组建而成，隶属东北民主联军（后改称东北人民解放军）。在辽沈战役和平津战役中发挥重要作用，后整编为第三十九军。
description.en: Formed in 1946 from the 8th Brigade, 10th Brigade, and Independent Brigade of the former New Fourth Army's 3rd Division, subordinate to the Northeast Democratic United Army (later renamed Northeast People's Liberation Army). It played a significant role in the Liaoshen and Pingjin Campaigns before being reorganized into the 39th Corps.

en: 3rd Division of the New Fourth Army

description.zh-cn: 1940年由八路军一一五师三四四旅大部发展而来，在苏北与陈毅的新四军会合后改编而成。第二次国共内战期间进军东北，主力后组建为东北民主联军第二纵队。
description.en: Developed from the main force of the 344th Brigade of the 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army in 1940, it was reorganized after meeting with Chen Yi's New Fourth Army in northern Jiangsu. During the Chinese Civil War, it marched into the Northeast, and its main force was later formed into the 2nd Column of the Northeast Democratic United Army.

nodes.id: 八路军一一五师三四四旅

zh-cn: 八路军一一五师三四四旅
en: 344th Brigade, 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期由红十五军团改编而成，隶属八路军第一一五师。后发展为第五纵队，并于1940年大部改编为新四军第三师。
description.en: Reorganized from the Red 15th Army Corps during the Second Sino-Japanese War, subordinate to the 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army. It later developed into the 5th Column, and its main force was reorganized into the 3rd Division of the New Fourth Army in 1940.

nodes.id: 中国工农红军第十五军团

zh-cn: 中国工农红军第十五军团
en: 15th Army Corps of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 1935年9月由红二十五军与西北红军（红二十六军、红二十七军）会师后整编而成。1935年11月与中央红军会师后编入红一方面军。抗日战争爆发后改编为八路军一一五师三四四旅。
description.en: Formed in September 1935 after the merging of the Red 25th Army and the Northwest Red Army (Red 26th and 27th Armies). It was incorporated into the First Front Army of the Red Army after meeting with the Central Red Army in November 1935. After the outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War, it was reorganized into the 344th Brigade, 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北部战区陆军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北部战区的陆军组成部分，领导和指挥战区内的陆军部队。
description.en: The ground force component of the PLA Northern Theater Command, responsible for leading and commanding army units within the theater.

en: First Front Army of the Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军主力部队之一。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生于北京的政治风波，中国人民解放军部分军队奉命进京执行戒严任务。
description.en: A political turmoil that occurred in Beijing in 1989, during which parts of the People's Liberation Army were ordered into the city to enforce martial law.

description.zh-cn: 1950年代在朝鲜半岛爆发的军事冲突，中国人民志愿军参与其中。
description.en: A military conflict that broke out on the Korean Peninsula in the 1950s, in which the Chinese People's Volunteer Army participated.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间在中国境内爆发的第二次内战。
description.en: The second phase of the civil war in China fought between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪30年代至40年代，中华民国与大日本帝国之间发生的战争。
description.en: A war fought between the Republic of China and the Empire of Japan from the 1930s to the 1940s.

en: Deepening national defense and military reform

description.zh-cn: 2015年起由习近平领导的中央军委推动的中国人民解放军军事改革。
description.en: A military reform of the People's Liberation Army initiated in 2015, promoted by the Central Military Commission led by Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席。2017年宣布并推动了包括组建第七十九集团军在内的军队改革。
description.en: Chinese politician, current General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He announced and promoted military reforms in 2017, including the formation of the 79th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，大将军衔。曾任红十五军团军团长、八路军一一五师三四四旅旅长。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army with the rank of Da Jiang (Grand General). He served as the commander of the Red 15th Army Corps and the commander of the 344th Brigade, 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，上将军衔。曾任新四军第三师第十旅旅长、东北民主联军第二纵队司令员、中国人民解放军第三十九军首任军长。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army with the rank of Shang Jiang (General). He served as the commander of the 10th Brigade of the New Fourth Army's 3rd Division, commander of the 2nd Column of the Northeast Democratic United Army, and the first commander of the PLA's 39th Corps.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，中将军衔。曾任第三十九军政委、军长。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army with the rank of Zhong Jiang (Lieutenant General). He served as Political Commissar and later Commander of the 39th Corps.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，大将军衔。曾任八路军一一五师三四四旅政委、新四军第三师师长兼政委。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army with the rank of Da Jiang (Grand General). He served as Political Commissar of the 344th Brigade, 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army, and Commander and Political Commissar of the 3rd Division of the New Fourth Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，中将军衔。林彪反革命集团主犯之一。曾任东北民主联军第二纵队政委、第三十九军首任政委。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army with the rank of Zhong Jiang (Lieutenant General). One of the principal culprits in the Lin Biao counter-revolutionary clique. He served as Political Commissar of the 2nd Column of the Northeast Democratic United Army and the first Political Commissar of the 39th Corps.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任第三十九集团军军长。
description.en: A Lieutenant General of the People's Liberation Army, he served as the commander of the 39th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任第七十九集团军首任军长。
description.en: A General of the People's Liberation Army, he served as the first commander of the 79th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任第七十九集团军军长。
description.en: A Lieutenant General of the People's Liberation Army, he served as the commander of the 79th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾任第七十九集团军首任政治委员。
description.en: A Major General of the People's Liberation Army, he served as the first political commissar of the 79th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任第七十九集团军政治委员。
description.en: A Lieutenant General of the People's Liberation Army, he served as the political commissar of the 79th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军的师级部队之一，在朝鲜战争中与中国人民志愿军第三十九军于云山等地交战。
description.en: A division of the United States Army, which engaged the Chinese People's Volunteer Army 39th Corps at Unsan and other locations during the Korean War.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十九集团军
relationships.target: 北部战区陆军

description.zh-cn: 第七十九集团军自组建以来，一直隶属于北部战区陆军。
description.en: Since its formation, the 79th Group Army has been subordinate to the Northern Theater Command Ground Force.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军陆军第三十九集团军
relationships.target: 北部战区陆军

description.zh-cn: 2016年军区改战区后，原沈阳军区下辖的第三十九集团军划归北部战区陆军。
description.en: After the 2016 reform replacing military regions with theater commands, the 39th Group Army, formerly under the Shenyang Military Region, was assigned to the Northern Theater Command Ground Force.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十九集团军

description.zh-cn: 在2017年的深化国防和军队改革中，以陆军第三十九集团军为基础，调整组建了陆军第七十九集团军。
description.en: During the 2017 deepening national defense and military reform, the 79th Group Army was formed based on the 39th Group Army.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军陆军第三十九集团军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十九集团军

description.zh-cn: 陆军第七十九集团军由原陆军第三十九集团军为基础调整组建而成。
description.en: The 79th Group Army was formed by reorganizing the former 39th Group Army.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第三十九军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第三十九集团军

description.zh-cn: 1985年，第三十九军改编为陆军第三十九集团军。
description.en: In 1985, the 39th Corps was reorganized into the 39th Group Army.

relationships.source: 东北民主联军第二纵队
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第三十九军

description.zh-cn: 1949年，第二纵队整编为中国人民解放军第三十九军。
description.en: In 1949, the 2nd Column was reorganized into the PLA 39th Corps.

relationships.target: 东北民主联军第二纵队

description.zh-cn: 1946年，原新四军第三师的第八旅、第十旅、独立旅组建为东北民主联军第二纵队。
description.en: In 1946, the 8th, 10th, and Independent Brigades of the former New Fourth Army's 3rd Division were formed into the 2nd Column of the Northeast Democratic United Army.

relationships.source: 八路军一一五师三四四旅
relationships.target: 新四军第三师

description.zh-cn: 1940年，黄克诚率三四四旅大部进入华中地区，改编为新四军第三师。
description.en: In 1940, Huang Kecheng led the main force of the 344th Brigade into Central China, where it was reorganized into the 3rd Division of the New Fourth Army.

relationships.source: 中国工农红军第十五军团
relationships.target: 八路军一一五师三四四旅

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，红十五军团编为八路军一一五师三四四旅。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, the Red 15th Army Corps was reorganized into the 344th Brigade of the 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army.

relationships.source: 中国工农红军第十五军团
relationships.target: 红一方面军

description.zh-cn: 1935年11月3日，红十五军团和中央红军会师，并编入红一方面军建制。
description.en: On November 3, 1935, the Red 15th Army Corps met with the Central Red Army and was incorporated into the First Front Army.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军陆军第三十九集团军
relationships.target: 六四事件

description.zh-cn: 1989年，第三十九集团军曾到北京参与戒严任务。
description.en: In 1989, the 39th Group Army was deployed to Beijing to participate in the martial law enforcement.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第三十九军
relationships.target: 朝鲜战争

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争期间，第三十九军入朝参战，参与了多次重要战役。
description.en: During the Korean War, the 39th Corps entered Korea and participated in several major battles.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第三十九军
relationships.target: 美国陆军第1骑兵师

description.zh-cn: 在抗美援朝第一次战役的云山战斗中，第三十九军与美国陆军第1骑兵师交战并重创对方。
description.en: In the Battle of Unsan during the First Phase Offensive of the Korean War, the 39th Corps engaged and severely damaged the US 1st Cavalry Division.

relationships.source: 东北民主联军第二纵队
relationships.target: 第二次国共内战

description.zh-cn: 东北民主联军第二纵队是第二次国共内战期间东北战场的主力部队之一，参加了辽沈战役、平津战役等。
description.en: The 2nd Column of the Northeast Democratic United Army was one of the main forces in the Northeast China theater during the Chinese Civil War, participating in the Liaoshen and Pingjin Campaigns.

relationships.source: 八路军一一五师三四四旅
relationships.target: 中国抗日战争

description.zh-cn: 八路军一一五师三四四旅作为八路军的一部分，参与了抗日战争。
description.en: As part of the Eighth Route Army, the 344th Brigade of the 115th Division participated in the Second Sino-Japanese War.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十九集团军

description.zh-cn: 作为中央军委主席，习近平接见新调整组建的包括第七十九集团军在内的84个军级单位主官，并发布训令，标志着该集团军的正式成立。
description.en: As Chairman of the Central Military Commission, Xi Jinping met with the commanders of 84 newly adjusted or formed corps-level units, including the 79th Group Army, and issued instructions, marking the official establishment of the group army.

relationships.target: 中国工农红军第十五军团
新四军第三师
